name: Ouroboros (itch) (Triple Cat Games)
description:
(Download Below) Awaken and explore a beautiful and mysterious world in this short game experience. Original inspiration for the game was The World tarot card, as well as Studio Ghibli films.  Created by Trinity Beltran

Game Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Walk  |  SpaceBar - Jump  |  Escape  -  Pause

Produced by Triple Cat Games
